title: Nanking (2011) (digital) (Lynx-Empire) cbr
description:
Nanking, former capital city of Nationalist China.
December 1937: the Japanese army begins a massacre that will last for six weeks. The family of the young Xia Shuqin is caught in the turmoil that will make 300,000 victims. 
Seventy-four years later, a japanese lawyer traces back the girl's experiences through a series of testimonies that lead him, in his turn, to face the horrors of the past ...

enjoy
